briefTitle: Radiotherapy Alternates Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 (Her2) Expression in Human Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Study on Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 (Her2) Expression Changes in Human Breast Cancer After Radiotherapy
conditions: Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 Negative Carcinoma of Breast
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* histological confirmed advanced breast cancer
* cancer sample can be obtained by fine needle biopsy
* IHC and FISH confirmed Her2 negative
* radiotherapy indication for local residual cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* no radiotherapy indication
* patient refuse
